title: Hokusai: an animated sketch book
creator_credit: Tony White and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: An animated tribute to an “old man mad about drawing”, Japanese artist, Katsushika Hokusai, 1760-1849, which explores 60 of the 30 thousand drawings he is reputed to have produced during his lifetime. Narrated by Michael Bates. Voice of Hokusai: Eric Chitty.
